titleInfo.title: Children Perform at the National Home for Jewish Children in Denver

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 6 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#388 Residents of Nat. Home for Jewish Children'' and ''Jewish Sheltering Home 1910-1950s.'' On back of photograph: ''rehearsing for a show: (right) Sarah Klein and (left) Mildren Seidenberg (probably Hansel and Gretel) presented at East School Shows presented for entire community. All the rich Jewish bachelors served as ushers #388.''

mods.abstract: Sarah Klein (right) and Mildren Seidenberg (left) rehearse for a show at the National Home for Jewish Children at Denver, located in Denver, Colorado. The play (probably Hansel and Gretal) was presented at East High School in Denver and was open to the entire community.
mods.note: Donated by the National Asthma Center.
